name: Sliceolation
description:
Drag to slice the blob.

Isolate candies completely to score them. How many can you slice in 200 seconds?

An experiment in 3D procedural generation made for AI and Games Jam 2022 by VulcanStorm 

Developed mostly live on twitch, my thanks to twitch viewers, family and playtesters, you know who you are, for assisting in development and with debugging the game.
